definition: to make/to build/to manufacture/to invent/to fabricate/to go to/party (in a lawsuit or legal agreement)/crop/classifier for crops

sentences.english: Wrought alloys possess good forgeability , it gives way to pressure.
sentences.chinese: 锻造合金具有良好的可锻性，在压力下会变形。

sentences.english: Some blacksmithing recipes require leather, which you will need to buy from a skinner.
sentences.chinese: 某些锻造配方还需要皮革，你可以从剥皮者那里购买。

sentences.english: Our company is the nation's largest professional Duanzao Chang one.
sentences.chinese: 我公司是国内最大的专业锻造厂之一。

sentences.english: The results in this paper are also applicable to non-automatic control of forging technology.
sentences.chinese: 本文所得到的结果，亦适用于非自动锻造的引伸工艺。

sentences.english: Each forged parts and cap screw with Batch code links to Test Certificate sheet.
sentences.chinese: 每一个锻造部件都带有相对应的炉号和检测证书。

sentences.english: Study on Simulation and CAPP Expert System of Forging Process for Large-Scale Module;
sentences.chinese: 介绍了差温无模锻造新工艺的试验和模拟结果。

sentences.english: It tempers the enthusiasm of the architect, the life of the individual.
sentences.chinese: 它锻造了建筑师的热情，锤炼了个人的生活。

sentences.english: When the term forging is used, it usually means hot forging .
sentences.chinese: 当提到锻造术语时，通常意味热锻。

sentences.english: The smith forged the plow with great skill.
sentences.chinese: 那铁匠技术娴熟地锻造马的蹄铁。

sentences.english: The hydraulic press produces the general pressure is big, commonly used in forging and ramming.
sentences.chinese: 水压机产生的总压力较大，常用于锻造和冲压。

sentences.english: The builders themselves have built their companies with successful initial public offerings and by attracting foreign investment.
sentences.chinese: 建筑商通过成功上市并吸引外资，锻造了自己的实力。

sentences.english: In the past kitchen knives were made in a forge.
sentences.chinese: 过去厨房用刀是在锻造厂打出来的。

sentences.english: Pack your gear and supplies comfortably with the Forge 35.
sentences.chinese: 包你的装备和用品的舒适与锻造35。

sentences.english: Iridium, osmium and ruthenium, unwrought or in powder form.
sentences.chinese: 铱，锇及钌，未锻造者或粉状。

sentences.english: It summarizes the development of the forging technology of heavy disk-shaped forging.
sentences.chinese: 综述了饼类锻件锻造工艺的发展。

sentences.english: It forges persistence which is an essential trait required for achieving success.
sentences.chinese: 它锻造毅力，而这是取得成功所需的一个必备特征。

definition: to quench/to temper/to harden by quenching
to cast (pour metal into a mold)
variant of 鏈|链[lian4], chain/variant of 煉|炼[lian4]
to cast in metal/(fig.) to forge/to fashion
after hard work and numerous revisions (idiom)/the vicissitudes of life
